functions.tag: {CustomModelData:3,CustomAttributes:1b,Stock:{Status:"vip"},display:{Name:'{"translate":"ゴールデン・ソラカブ","color":"#FFD65B","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"毎日価値が変動する高級志向の不思議な株。","color":"#FF0075","italic":false}','{"translate":"数日経つと腐り価値がなくなる。","color":"#FF0075","italic":false},[{"translate":"取引番号："."color":"white","italic":false,"bold":true},{"text":"1"}]']}}
